start.text: I wish I was somewhere else right now.
Lets just get this over with before I have second thoughts.
I shouldn't have signed up for this!

start_boss.text: Look at the size of that thing! Why did I get myself into this?

retreat.text: Fight or flight, I choose the latter!
I'm out of here, good luck to the rest of you!

out_of_missiles.text: I'm out of missiles, sorry boss.
Missile racks are dry, this isn't good.

engaged.text: I don't want to but, bringing all weapons to bear!
Oh boy, I think we pissed them off.

need_help.text: They got me pinned down, please assist!
I'm in way over my head!

pursuing.text: I've got them on the run!
I believe we have the upper hand.

running.text: I knew this was a bad idea!
Boss, I have to pull back.

hull_90.text: My ship's armor has been shredded!

hull_50.text: I need help, my ship is taking heavy damage!
Over half my decks are exposed to hard vacuum!
I really need backup, my ship is in bad shape!

hull_30.text: My ship is critically damaged, I NEED HELP!
I should have never signed up for this, prepare the escape pods!
Luck isn't saving me this time!

overload.text: Capacitors have overloaded, I need assistance!
Ship controls are unresponsive, please help!

death.text: See you on the other side!

victory_boss.text: Remind me to set some boundaries.
